StatDef.label: psychic amplifier level
StatDef.description: Minimum level of psychic amplifier implant required to perform this psycast.

StatDef.label: casting time
StatDef.description: How long it takes to perform this ability.

StatDef.label: entropy gain
StatDef.description: How much psychic entropy will be added as a result of performing this ability.

StatDef.label: range
StatDef.description: The maximum distance to a target of this ability, or to the center of the target location.

StatDef.label: duration
StatDef.description: How long the effects of this ability last.

StatDef.label: effect radius
StatDef.description: The radius of the area of effect of this ability.

StatDef.label: goodwill impact
StatDef.description: How casting this ability on someone will impact relations with their faction.

StatDef.label: detection chance
StatDef.description:
The likelihood of this psycast being detected when it is performed.

Some factions try to enforce laws which restrict some psycasts to those holding specific titles. When you use a psycast, there is a chance that the psychic signature will be detected at a distance, which leads to diplomatic consequences.

The chance of detection can be eliminated using a psychic silencer implant.
